DIA_Araxos02_AraxosJoin_15_01: What can you tell me about the job of a runner?
DIA_Araxos02_AraxosJoin_03_02: Quite a lot, but first admit it: it's nice to be in an organization where they give you free booze and weed at the very start, isn't it?
DIA_Araxos02_AraxosJoin_15_03: Sure... now it's nice, let's see what happens in the morning.
DIA_Araxos02_AraxosJoin_03_04: Fear not, there is no hangover after the guild hooch!
DIA_Araxos02_AraxosJoin_03_05: Because it's so strong, you'll have time to drink something again before you get real sober.
DIA_Araxos02_AraxosJoin_03_07: You are not the armed arm of the Guild. You are one of the mercenaries, but as a runner, you are not meant for combat or protection assignments.
DIA_Araxos02_AraxosJoin_03_08: You can take such orders, but you do it at your own risk. You can't hold a grudge against anyone if you throw yourself at a group of thugs and get mugged.
DIA_Araxos02_AraxosJoin_03_12: I hope so, I hope so! Hehe!
